attributes.action: Stop the Closure of Latchmere House Prison
attributes.additional_details: Stop the closure of Latchmere House Resettlement Prison at the end of September. This will mean the loss of 200 spaces. We are the best resettlement prison in the country and are consistently performing on or above target, and also have the lowest reoffending rate in the country. If successful rehabilitation is important to the government then we must stay open.
